name: Beelzeboogie
description:
A game made for the Global Game Jam 2016:

It is a dark, gloomy night. You walk through a forest, alone, in the graveyard silence. Pushing through into a clearing, the evil washes over you, and cold fear grips your heart with it's dread claws. Tonight, you alone bear witness, to the Beelzeboogie.
